name: 2D Platformer Player Character Controller Early Prototype
name_original: 2D Platformer Player Character Controller Early Prototype
description:
Short prototype. My idea is to add enemies and guns later on if this turns out to be fun to play.

Instructions:

A, D = Left, right. W = Jump. S = Groundslam.  Space = Dash(one time while in air). You can walljump by holding A or D and pressing jump while on a wall.
